Label: Estimated probability that streamgaging density will be halved by 2023 in basin
Category used in plotting water scarcity
Water scarcity measured as Normalized Deficit Cumulated (NDC, Devineni et al. 2015) aggregated to HUC6 basin
Category used in plotting flood risk
Percentage of the total population inhabiting areas where a flood study exists that lives in a 100-yr flood zone
Category used in plotting fish biodiversity
Average Endemism weighted richness/units among HUC8 sub-basins within HUC6 basin
Average Endemism weighted richness/units for threatened and endangered species among HUC8 sub-basins within HUC6 basin
Average number of threatened and endangered species among HUC8 sub-basins within HUC6 basin
Estimated population living within HUC6 basin (2010 census)
Percentage of the total population that inhabits areas where a flood study exists
